review: This thing is awesome for 40$ and if you are a prime member you actually do get quite a bit of extra content / movies / shows that netflix does not offer. It has shut off a few times randomly but i don't really care. Simply unplug and plug back in and realize how moderately priced the product is. One thing i did not know what that it DOES use a power outlet but no big deal.After this purchase i will be buying the bigger version for another TV set up.
